page.title: 13HOBBIES AND ACTIVIES
page.content:
{Swimming I enjoy swimming a lot. I am a member of Avonbourne School Swimming Club run by Miss Bones and Miss Cannan. Before I went to swimming club I was afraid to go out of my depth but now I have gained confidence and I am able to go to the deep end. I have gained my 25 metres and my 50 metres badges. J Simms-2B1
{Drama} I belong to a drama group at the Boscombe drama centre, it is on Saturdays at 10am to 12 o'clock. I enjoy it very much, I have been in one production "Charlie and the Chocolate Factory" and I was Mr Salt. I was very nervous at first but afterwards I enjoyed it and I was very pleased with my performance. Dagmar Evens.
